Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ from Giloh (גִּילֹנִי) ► counselor of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which humans have lost their strength as a result of laborious work which requires a lot of energy, either physically or mentally
literally: weak of hands; hence: = state in which humans lack the confidence to perform a certain event
= causative action by which humans inspire a strong fear in (other) humans or animals, ► resulting in panic

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

Node.gloss: to be straight in the eyes (of someone) > to be accepted|to be approved|to please
Node.definition: literally: to be straight in the eyes of someone; hence: = state/process by which humans consider someone or something good

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= man; ◄ Arkite (אַרְכִּי) ► counselor of king David (דָּוִד)
= member of clan; ◄ part of tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not

= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which humans are in a state of anger, lack compassion, and do not tolerate any opposition

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= large mammal with thick fur and a rather doglike face; walks on all fours but may stand up on its back legs to get a better view; maybe 2 meters tall when standing up and weigh over 200 kilos; feeds on roots, berries, wild fruit, mice, and lizards, and, occasionally, small livestock; ◄ |iUrsus arctos syriacus|i*; ► dangerous when provoked or robbed of cubs; ≈ associated with violence and danger
= state in which humans or animals have lost one or more of their offspring

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms
= action when people or objects stay overnight in a certain place
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans go to a location where they will not be readily seen by others; ► in order to be safe from danger or to attack someone else
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heavy blow; = action by which humans or deites cause serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example

= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
literally: (one's) heart melts; hence: = state in which humans lose all courage
literally: (one's) heart melts; hence: = state in which humans lose all courage
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= town, also known as Laish (לַיִשׁ) and Leshem (לֶשֶׁם) ◄ located in northern Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► first inhabited by Sidonians (צִידֹונִי) but later conquered by Danites (דָּנִי) who renamed it Dan (דָּן) after the founder of their tribe
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

m.definition: = town; ◄ located in the Negeb (נֶגֶב) at the southern border of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► used esp. in combination with Dan (דָּן) at the northern border of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) to refer to all Israel

Node.definition: = minute fragments; ◄ resulting from wearing down of esp. siliceous rocks and found covering parts of the sea shore, river beds, deserts, etc.; ► contains materials for the production of dye and glass; ≈ symbol of large quantity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= armed conflict in which weapons are used to attack an enemy
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

Node.gloss: to cause to remain|to leave over
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans, plants, or objects to remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
literally: to cause to hold, carry; hence: = causative action by which humans take hold of objects and bring them to another location

= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

= piece of stout cord; ◄ made by twisting together palm fibres, linen, or reeds; ► used for tying and keeping things together, climbing, measuring, drawing things to oneself, making traps, etc.; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to refer to conditions that try to take control of people; a rope tied around the head is a symbol of submission
= causative action by which humans or animals move relatively heavy objects by pulling them over the ground

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= man; ◄ son of Zadok (צָדֹוק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► spied on Absalom (אַבְשָׁלֹום) for David (דָּוִד) together with Jonathan (יְהֹונָתָן) the son of Abiathar (אֶבְיָתָר)
= spring; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= action by which humans or deities act without delay

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= location; ◄ east of the Mount of Olives, near Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם)

= hole in the ground that reaches underground water; ◄ usually manmade, dug out of the ground, or hewn from rock, but may also be naturally occurring; ► used for accessing, collecting and storing water; used by shepherds as a source of water for their animals; ≈ regarded as a source of life because of its water; sometimes used as a metaphor for a woman, possibly based on the physical resemblance of the well to the vagina and its connotation as a source of life
= area enclosed by walls or buildings

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a relatively large piece of cloth, ► used to close off the entrance to (part of) a tent, or, more generally, as a covering

= hole in the ground that reaches underground water; ◄ usually manmade, dug out of the ground, or hewn from rock, but may also be naturally occurring; ► used for accessing, collecting and storing water; used by shepherds as a source of water for their animals; ≈ regarded as a source of life because of its water; sometimes used as a metaphor for a woman, possibly based on the physical resemblance of the well to the vagina and its connotation as a source of life
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown location; normally used with the purpose of finding out which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found
= man; ◄ son of Zadok (צָדֹוק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► spied on Absalom (אַבְשָׁלֹום) for David (דָּוִד) together with Jonathan (יְהֹונָתָן) the son of Abiathar (אֶבְיָתָר)

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a body of water of unknown shape or size
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

see אֹור (אֹור)|= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.gloss: to strangle oneself (with a rope around the neck)|to hang oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans kill themselves ◄ by cutting their air supply
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) and Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה)
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= woman; ◄ daughter of Nahash (נָחָשׁ) ► sister of David (דָּוִד)
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man; ◄ son of Nahash (נָחָשׁ) king of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)
= man; ◄ son of Ammiel (עַמִּיאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Machir (מָכִיר) from Lodebar (לֹא דְבָר)
= town; ► located east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) river in Gilead (גִּלְעָד) assigned to tribe of Gad (גָּד)
= man; ◄ from Rogelim (רֹגְלִים) in Gilead (גִּלְעָד) ► an elder who supported king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant or descendant of Gilead (גִּלְעָד) tribe and territory of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= village; ◄ in Gilead (גִּלְעָד)
= receptacle of undetermined size; ◄ made out of metal; ► used both for household and religious purposes
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
literally: of a potter; hence: = pottery made of fired clay
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin

= a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed
= flour made from ground grain kernels, ► used for baking bread, as ingredient for food, and as grain offering
= ears of grain that have been cooked over a fire ► to form a meal that can be carried conveniently when traveling or working outside

= product of an erect plant, not a vine, reaching to 1 meter (3 feet) in height; its stem branches only in the upper part, and it has no tendrils; it has white flowers that, when they ripen, form pods containing 3 6 large flat beans of a cream or tan color; ◄ Vicia faba or Faba vulgaris; ► used for food

= type of vegetable from a low branched plant with a weak stem; its flowers develop into a short pod with only one seed inside, about the size of a small pea, one type of which is reddish brown in color; ◄ Lens culinaris; ► typically used in soups and stews
= ears of grain that have been cooked over a fire ► to form a meal that can be carried conveniently when traveling or working outside
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= substance ◄ made out of pressed curds of cow milk, ► used as food

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

Node.gloss: to bring close|to bring near|to present|to offer
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause (other) humans, animals and objects to move to a location closer to a point of reference
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness
= state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
